summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 7.6°C) and outside temperature (down 6.7°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 13176 lux) and cloud levels (up 640 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 14865 lux) and cloud levels (up 1590 m) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 640.0m lower than yesterday, 584.0m lower than the past week, 1589.9m lower than the past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 1059m and a peak of 3380m, averaging 1084.2m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; you can expect comfortable, mild temperatures. Also, pleasant humidity levels. Drizzle or light rain possible, occasional overcast conditions, and weak sunlight because of clouds. Changeable conditions.
